problem_text: Figure shows a uniform disk, with mass $M=2.5 \mathrm{~kg}$ and radius $R=20 \mathrm{~cm}$, mounted on a fixed horizontal axle. A block with mass $m=1.2 \mathrm{~kg}$ hangs from a massless cord that is wrapped around the rim of the disk. Find the tension in the cord. The cord does not slip, and there is no friction at the axle.
